artifact.content: Name: Administrator Login ID: UC1 Author: M2 Event: The administrator is logging into the server application System: Server Administrative Console Actors: Administrator Overview: The administrator logs into the system

Name: Create New Profile ID: UC2 Author: M3 Event: Customer requests addition to the VoIP system System: Server Administrative Console Actors: Administrator Overview: This use case captures the process of setting up an account for a new user

Name: Add New Account ID: UC3 Author: M2 Event: The administrator adds a new account to a customer profile System: Server Administrative Console Actors: Administrator Overview: The administrator adds a new account that involves mapping a new extension to an IP address.

Name: Search Profile ID: UC4 Author: M2 Event: The administrator searches for a customer System: Server Administrative Console Actors: Administrator Overview: The administrator searches for a customer in the database based on certain search criteria

Name: Update Profile ID: UC5 Author: M2 Event: A customer has requested for an update on his/her account System: Server Administrative Console Actors: Administrator Overview: The administrator modifies the user account information from externally provided details

Name: Switch Billing Plan ID: UC6 Author: M1 Event: Administrator changes a customer�s current billing plan System: Server Administrative Console Actors: Administrator Overview: The administrator searches for a customer profile and switches plan

Name: Create Basic Plan ID: UC7 Author: M2 Event: The administrator is creating a new basic plan System: Server Administrative Console Actors: Administrator Overview: The administrator accesses the system, chooses to create a new billing plan, enters the details of the plan and saves it.

Name: Create Discount Plan ID: UC8 Author: M2 Event: The administrator is creating a new discount plan System: Server Administrative Console Actors: Administrator Overview: The administrator accesses the system, chooses to create a new discount plan, enters the details of the plan and saves it.

Name: Attach Discount Billing Plan ID: UC9 Author: M2 Event: The administrator is adding a new discount plan to a billing plan System: Server Administrative Console Actors: Administrator Overview: The administrator attaches a discount plan to a billing plan

Name: Pay Bill ID: UC10 Author: M3 Event: Administrator enters payment information for customer. System: Server Administrative Console Actors: Administrator Overview: Illustrates process of inputting customer payment information into system.

Name: View Outstanding Accounts ID: UC11 Author: M4 Event: The administrator is viewing the information for all the account holders that have overdue payments System: Server Administrative Console Actors: Administrator Overview: The administrator looks up the users whose accounts are overdue

Name: Suspend Account ID: UC12 Author: M4 Event: The administrator is viewing the information for all the account holders that have overdue payments System: Server Administrative Console Actors: Administrator Overview: The administrator looks up the users whose accounts are overdue

Name: Terminate Service ID: UC13 Author: M4 Event: The administrator cancels an account System: Server Administrative Console Actors: Administrator Overview: The administrator searches for customer and deactivates account

Name: Resume Service ID: UC14 Author: M4 Event: The administrator cancels and account System: Server Administrative Console Actors: Administrator Overview: The administrator searches for customer and deactivates account

Name: Extension/IP Lookup ID: UC15 Author: M2 Event: The administrator is finding an IP from an extension number or vice-versa System: Server Administrative Console Actors: Administrator Overview: The administrator navigates the interfaces to lookup extensions and IP addresses

Name: Adjust Call Load ID: UC16 Author: M2 Event: The administrator adjusts the maximum call load System: Server Administrative Console Actors: Administrator Overview: The administrator sets the maximum call load

Name: Check Call Load ID: UC17 Author: M2 Event: The administrator checks for the current call load System: Server Administrative Console Actors: Administrator Overview: The administrator verifies the current call load

Name: Enable Device ID: UC18 Author: M2 Event: The administrator is manually enabling a device System: Server Administrative Console Actors: Administrator Overview: The administrator enters the choice of enabling or disabling a device. System ensures that the device is not already enabled or disabled.

Name: Disable Device ID: UC19 Author: M2 Event: The administrator is manually disabling a device System: Server Administrative Console Actors: Administrator Overview: The administrator enters the choice of enabling or disabling a device. System ensures that the device is not already enabled or disabled.
